document.full_text: in another blow to the notion that b vitamins ward off heart problems, a new clinical trial finds that folic acid supplements may not slow plaque buildup in healthy older adults' arteries.
document.title: folic acid fails in another heart-health study
lines_and_colors: in another blow to the notion that b vitamins ward off heart problems, a new clinical trial finds that folic acid supplements may not slow plaque buildup in healthy older adults' arteries.
